_header: Saint Mark makes mention us homily
_description: Gospel for Wednesday after the Fifteenth Sunday after Trinity in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint mark mase mencion vs omellHow it bifor þis tymes bifell…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Him nedes both to fast and praySo may he win him wele oway
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin (f. 119vb), “Respondens unus de turba.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia iiii proxima secundum Marcum (rubric, f. 119vb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.115-119.
